title: Strengthening Service Quality Practical Competencies: VR Utilization in P-12 Education: Experiential and Game-Based Science Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic scientific concepts and experience using digital devices
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three approaches for designing experiential science lessons using VR technology.
Learners can plan VR science education content for P-12 audiences by applying game-based learning principles.
Learners can develop one VR education scenario implementable in mobile environments and improve it through formative evaluation.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
